gen:link.label:label: PTV28: The item "UNITED KINGDOM" must not be reported except DZ dimension not including cases explicitly identified as 'material' (after 31/12/2020 reference date for regular FYE) -->Template 1: (All); Expression: If Financial year end (r0040) in PF.01.02 Basic information template like "31/12/.*" and Reporting reference date (r0030) in PF.01.02 Basic information template after "31/12/2020" then Member s2c_GA:GB is not allowed for reporting
